name: search customer by other conditions, mapping sansan with credit data but not have Credit Investigation

testSteps.description: [1] {submenuText=Credit Management, menuText=Accounting, validCustomerCode=a555, rowIndex=0, newRpBtn=New report, surveySelect=Survey institute and information source, indexSelect=Date of survey, indexAccounting=Index for accounting system, valueSurvey=帝国データ, valueIndex=2016/10/18, valueIndexAccounting=12, btnSaveDraft=Save draft, rowIndexCreditHistory=0, btnEdit=Edit, btnReject=Reject, btnBack=Back, successSave=Save successfully, successReject=Reject successful}

children.description: When I open submenu Credit Management of menu Accounting
And I search customer by code a555
And The system should show table result with records
And I click checkbox left of a row 0 into table result
And In accounting screen, I click button select
And In Credit Management page, Table Credit History no record
And In Credit Management page, I click button New report
And In Credit Management page, I select in Survey institute and information source is 帝国データ
And In Credit Management page, I select date in Date of survey is 2016/10/18
And In Credit Management page, I type in Index for accounting system is 12
And In Credit Management page, I click button Save draft
And In Credit Management page, System show message Save successfully
And In Credit Management page, I click record 0 in table Credit History in bottom
And In Credit Management page, I click button Edit
And In Credit Management page, I click button Reject
And In Credit Management page, I confirm action
And In Credit Management page, System show message Reject successful
Then In Credit Management page, Table Credit History no record

And In Credit Management page, System show list button can use
| New report |
| Back |

And In Credit Management page, System show list button can not use
| Edit |
| View |
| Duplicate |

And In Credit Management page, fields required can input
| Customer code (index) |
| Company name |
| Company name in Kana |

And In Credit Management page, fields can select
| Client code status |

And In Credit Management page, fields not required can input
| Year of starting business |
| Year of official establishment |
And In Credit Management page, I click button Back

userStory.narrative:
As a user
I want use Credit management

title: search customer by other conditions, mapping sansan with credit data but not have Credit Investigation
